name: King Kong 2: Ikari no Megaton Punch
name_original: King Kong 2: Ikari no Megaton Punch
description:
King Kong 2: Ikari no Megaton Punch is an action game. It came out on 18-12-1985. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
King Kong 2: Ikari no Megaton Punch is available on NES.
It was scored by Kinuyo Yamashita, Kiyohiro Sada, Satoe Terashima and Shinya Sakamoto.
